verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees.<s%> <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H3373>fears<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> that <S%H1980>walks<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
For you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3018>labor<s%> of your <S%H3709>hands:<s%> <S%H835>happy<s%> shall you be, and it shall be <S%H2896>well<s%> with you.

Your <S%H802>wife<s%> shall be as a <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> <S%H1612>vine<s%> by the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of your <S%H1004>house:<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> like <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H8363>plants<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about your <S%H7979>table.<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> that <S%H3651>thus<s%> shall the <S%H1397>man<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> that <S%H3373>fears<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> you out of <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> and you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2898>good<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life.<s%>
Yes, you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H1121>children's<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%> and <S%H7965>peace<s%> on <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
